p: DAB staining was performed as described previously [ 20]. Rice sheath epidermal cells inoculated with P. oryzae were isolated at 48 hpi, followed by DAB staining (1 mg mL âˆ’1, Sigma-Aldrich, St. Louis, MO, USA) for 8 h at room temperature and destaining with ethanol:acetic acid:glycerol (3:1:1, v/ v/ v).
